00015 //
00016 // Define this to be nonzero if you're using libnet 1.1 instead of 1.0
00017 //
00018 #define LIBNET11 1
00019 
00020 
00021 /*
00022    Simpler device driver for Minet
00023    No signals are used here.
00024 */
00025 
00026 using std::cout;
00027 using std::cerr;
00028 using std::endl;
00029 
00030 
00031 // device config
00032 char * device = NULL;
00033 
00034 // libnet stuff
00035 #if LIBNET11
00036 libnet_t * net_interface;
00037 #else
00038 struct libnet_link_int * net_interface;
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 // libpcap interface
00042 pcap_t * pcap_interface = NULL;
00043 
00044 
00045 // minet stuff
00046 // note that this currently will only work with the fifo-based
00047 // communication.
00048 MinetHandle ethermux_handle;
00049 MinetHandle pcap_handle;
00050

00052 
00053 static void Init() {
00054     char pcap_program[10240]; // some arbitrary large number
00055 
00056     /* Error message buffers */
00057     char pcap_errbuf[PCAP_ERRBUF_SIZE];
00058     char net_errbuf[LIBNET_ERRORBUF_SIZE];
00059 
00060     struct bpf_program pcap_filter;
00061     bpf_u_int32 pcap_net;
00062     bpf_u_int32 pcap_mask;
00063     int pcap_fd = 0;
00064 
00065     // get configuration
00066     char * ip     = getenv("MINET_IPADDR");
00067     char * device = getenv("MINET_ETHERNETDEVICE");
00068 
00069     if (!device) {
00070         cerr << "Please set MINET_ETHERNETDEVICE\n";
00071         exit(-1);
00072     }
00073 
00074     if (!ip) {
00075         cerr << "Set MINET_IPADDR" << endl;
00076         exit(-1);
00077     }
00078 
00079     // establish libnet session
00080 #if LIBNET11
00081     net_interface = libnet_init(LIBNET_LINK_ADV, device, net_errbuf);
00082 #else
00083     net_interface = libnet_open_link_interface(device, net_errbuf);
00084 #endif
00085 
00086     if (net_interface == NULL) {
00087         cerr << "Can't open interface: " << net_errbuf << endl;
00088         exit(-1);
00089     }
00090     
00091     // establish pcap filter
00092     if (pcap_lookupnet(device, &pcap_net, &pcap_mask, pcap_errbuf)) {
00093         cerr << "Can't get net and mask for " << device << ": " << pcap_errbuf << endl;
00094         exit(-1);
00095     }
00096 
00097     cerr << "pcap_net=" << pcap_net << ", pcap_mask=" << pcap_mask << endl;
00098 
00099     if ((pcap_interface = pcap_open_live(device, 1518, 1, 0, pcap_errbuf)) == NULL) {
00100         cerr<< "Can't open " << device << ":" << pcap_errbuf << endl;
00101         exit(-1);
00102     }
00103     
00104 
00105     //
00106     // This is crucial.  It controls what your students will see
00107     //
00108     sprintf(pcap_program, "host %s or arp", ip);
00109 
00110     cerr << "pcap_program='" << pcap_program << "'" << endl;
00111 
00112     if (pcap_compile(pcap_interface, &pcap_filter, pcap_program, 0, pcap_mask)) {
00113         cerr<<"Can't compile filter\n";
00114         exit(-1);
00115     }
00116 
00117     if (pcap_setfilter(pcap_interface, &pcap_filter)) {
00118         cerr << "Can't set filter\n";
00119         exit(-1);
00120     }
00121 
00122     pcap_fd = pcap_fileno(pcap_interface);
00123     
00124     // connect to the ethernet mux
00125     MinetInit(MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER);
00126 
00127     ethermux_handle = MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) ? 
00128         MinetAccept(MINET_ETHERNET_MUX) : 
00129         MINET_NOHANDLE;
00130 
00131     // register pcap as an external connection
00132     pcap_handle = MinetAddExternalConnection(pcap_fd, pcap_fd);
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 static void ProcessIncoming() {
00137     struct pcap_pkthdr header;
00138     const u_char * packet = NULL;
00139     
00140     packet = pcap_next(pcap_interface, &header);
00141   
00142     if (packet == NULL) {
00143         cerr << "pcap_next returned a null pointer\n";
00144         exit(-1);
00145     }
00146     
00147     RawEthernetPacket p((const char *)packet, (unsigned)(header.len));
00148     
00149     MinetSend(ethermux_handle, p);
00150 }
00151 
00152 
00153 static void ProcessOutgoing() {
00154     RawEthernetPacket p;
00155     int ret = 0;
00156 
00157     MinetReceive(ethermux_handle, p);
00158 
00159     //
00160     //
00161     // Make sure that the packet is allowed to be sent
00162     //
00163     Packet cp(p);
00164     cp.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<EthernetHeader>(ETHERNET_HEADER_LEN);
00165     
00166     EthernetHeader eh = cp.FindHeader(Headers::EthernetHeader);
00167     EthernetAddr ea;
00168     EthernetProtocol ep;
00169     
00170     eh.GetSrcAddr(ea);
00171     eh.GetProtocolType(ep);
00172 
00173 
00174     if ( (ea != MyEthernetAddr) || 
00175          ( (ep != PROTO_ARP) && 
00176            (ep != PROTO_IP) ) ) {
00177         cerr << "discarding packet " << p << endl;
00178         MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("dropped illegal outgoing packet"));
00179         return;
00180     }
00181 
00182 
00183 #if LIBNET11
00184     ret = libnet_adv_write_link(net_interface, (u_char *)(p.data), p.size);
00185 #else
00186     ret = libnet_write_link_layer(net_interface, (const char *)device, (u_char *)(p.data), p.size);
00187 #endif
00188 
00189     if (ret < 0) {
00190         cerr << "Can't write output packet to link" << endl;
00191         exit(-1);
00192     }
00193 
00194 
00195 }
00196     
00197 
00198 static void Run() {
00199     MinetEvent event;
00200 
00201     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("device_driver2 operating"));
00202     cerr << "device_driver2 operating" << endl;
00203 
00204 
00205     // Main Event Loop
00206     while (MinetGetNextEvent(event) == 0) {
00207 
00208         if ( (event.eventtype != MinetEvent::Dataflow) ||
00209              (event.direction != MinetEvent::IN) ) {
00210             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
00211             cerr << "Unknown event ignored." << endl;
00212         } else {
00213             if (event.handle == ethermux_handle) {
00214                 ProcessOutgoing();
00215             } else if (event.handle == pcap_handle) {
00216                 ProcessIncoming();
00217             } else {
00218                 MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown handle ignored."));
00219                 cerr << "Unknown handle ignored." << endl;
00220             }
00221         }
00222 
00223     }
00224 }

00230 int main(int argc, char * argv[]) {
00231     Init();
00232     Run();
00233 }
